articles.description: Goalkeeper Anatoly Trubin's header gives Jose Mourinho an unforgettable moment as Benfica beat Real Madrid to stay alive in the Champions League.
articles.title: How Jose Mourinho's Benfica stunned Real Madrid to qualify for Champions League play-offs

articles.description: Five of the eight teams to qualify automatically for the Champions League were from the Premier League, so why have they been so dominant?
articles.title: Champions League - why are Premier League sides dominating?

articles.description: After sweeping their way into the last 16, chief football writer Phil McNulty asks can the Champions League rescue Liverpool's season of turmoil?
articles.title: Liverpool 6-0 Qarabag: Can Champions League rescue Liverpool's season of turmoil?

articles.description: Under-pressure Tottenham boss Thomas Frank guides his side to an important victory at Eintracht Frankfurt to secure a place in the Champions League last 16.
articles.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 0-2 Tottenham: Thomas Frank's side seal last-16 Champions League spot

articles.description: He is one of the most winningest coaches in NFL history, but his snub from the Pro Footbal Hall of Fame adds to a growing list of defeats.
articles.title: Bill Belichick: An NFL God's fall from grace

articles.description: Antonio Conte lifted the Champions League as a player in 1995-96 but has experienced nothing but despair as a manager in the competition.
articles.title: Antonio Conte: Italian manager experiences more Champions League struggles after Napoli exit

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka is two wins away from continuing her reign of dominance with a third Australian Open title in four years. Will anyone stop her?
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Will anyone deny Aryna Sabalenka a third title in Melbourne?

articles.description: Newcastle United have experienced all manner of emotions at the Parc des Princes, but the visitors left with immense pride following a 1-1 draw against Paris St-Germain
articles.title: PSG 1-1 Newcastle: Howe's side prove they can mix it with European champions

articles.description: Kai Havertz scores on his first start for nearly a year as Arsenal complete a flawless league phase campaign in the Champions League.
articles.title: Arsenal 3-2 Kairat Almaty: Gunners keep 100% record in Champions League

articles.description: Barcelona came from behind to beat Copenhagen and secure direct progression to the last 16 of the Champions League.
articles.title: Barcelona 4-1 Copenhagen: Barcelona secure Champions League progress
